description:
The launcher wouldn't run so I got the command from the launcher and ran it in a terminal. 

xxx: env BAMF_DESKTOP_FILE_HINT=/var/lib/snapd/desktop/applications/slashlock_slashlock.desktop /snap/bin/slashlock

This is the result:

/snap/slashlock/5/bin/desktop-launch: line 169: /snap/slashlock/5/bin/wrapper: No such file or directory

The app won't open I got the same result as the last review did. I like the idea and I'm searching for a file encrypter but this one just didn't work. For anybody reading this review I wouldn't get it if I were you because it's a waste of time to download something that won't open (no offense to the developer).
its not opening on ubuntu. sucks.
